summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 forwarding a completed 'photo sourcing project' spreadsheet related to trial preparation. The email includes an attachment with location information for evidence items and CDs, and involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of an email checking on the status of a photo sourcing project for trial preparation, identified as an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Email inquiry about photo project
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email checking on the status of a photo sourcing project for trial preparation.

events.title: Photo project completion notification
events.description: An email is sent notifying that the photo sourcing project is completed, with an attached spreadsheet containing evidence item, CD name, and location information.

events.title: Forwarding of completed photo project
events.description: The email chain with the completed photo sourcing project spreadsheet is forwarded.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain from November 2021 related to trial preparation in the Epstein case.
A 'photo sourcing project' was completed, resulting in a spreadsheet with evidence item, CD name, and location information.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York was involved in requesting and receiving this information.
The email indicates ongoing trial preparation activities in late 2021.
The document shows coordination between legal teams regarding evidence organization and location tracking.
